segments.text: Abby Park Hotel . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to book a room for my wife and myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly sir . Could I have your arrival and departure dates ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will be arriving on Tuesday next week and staying for two days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a double room for you with a nice view of the park . Would that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that would be great . How much is the room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is ninety-five pounds per night . It is a double room with a bathroom . There is a fridge , coffee maker and a television in the room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the bathroom have a bath or a shower ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All our bathrooms have full size baths with a shower attachment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the room have an Internet connection ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , all our rooms have complimentary wireless Internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . Do you serve breakfast in the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , breakfast is included in the price . Our guests have the choice of a full English breakfast or a continental breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . Can I book the room ?
segments.speaker: S2
